caption.p: Comparison of global mean changes in climate extremes indices relative to 1981–2010 at 2°C and 1.5°C global warming for individual ensemble members and ensemble mean. ( a) Change in annual daily maximum temperature; ( b) percentage of days with maximum temperature above 90th percentile for 1981–2010; ( c) change in consecutive dry days; ( d) change in annual maximum 5-day rainfall.
